remarks: If ` S ` is a two-sided ideal in ` R ` , then ` U = R / S ` is a ring, called the quotient ring of ` R ` by ` S ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
qusring.u $e |- U = ( R /s ( R ~QG S ) ) $.
qusring.i $e |- I = ( 2Ideal ` R ) $.
qusring $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. I ) -> U e. Ring ) $.
